title: Iceborn Gauntlet
body:
Am I the only one who thinks this item is fucking stupid? It's so abused by so many champions. Like, why has riot not reworked this shit yet?   


{{item:3025}}  {{item:3025}}   {{item:3025}}   {{item:3025}}   {{item:3025}}   {{item:3025}}   {{item:3025}}   {{item:3025}}   {{item:3025}}   {{item:3025}}   {{item:3025}}   {{item:3025}}   {{item:3025}}   {{item:3025}}   {{item:3025}}   {{item:3025}}   {{item:3025}}   {{item:3025}}   {{item:3025}}   {{item:3025}}   {{item:3025}}   {{item:3025}}   {{item:3025}}   {{item:3025}}   {{item:3025}}   {{item:3025}}   {{item:3025}}   {{item:3025}}   {{item:3025}}

replies.body: its not abused by many champions at all, but ok.
Marginal third item on my blitz thats all I know
if you want to believe that go ahead. only champ i see run it is {{champion:81}} really if i were to run it i'd get it for armor.
{{champion:81}} {{champion:57}} {{champion:14}} {{champion:112}} {{champion:83}} {{champion:113}} {{champion:78}} All run it.  Especially Viktor and Poppy.

All of em but EZ and Vik don't really abuse it though lol.

EZ and Vik are just stupid cases that make it seem stronger then it is.
i only see {{champion:14}} and {{champion:81}} with {{champion:83}} here and there and none of them run it. or if they do we don't get far enough for them to grab it.
Ignore Char all he does is spew his negativity everywhere on forums because he has no life
